original_text: Do not walk off your path, to the right side or the left side. Keep away from everything that is evil. Do not walk off your path, to the right side or the left side. Keep away from everything that is evil.
korean_text: 좌로나 우로나 치우치지 말고 네 발을 악에서 떠나게 하라

sentences.original_text: Do not walk off your path
to the right side or the left side
Keep away from everything that is evil
Do not walk off your path
to the right side or the left side
Keep away from everything that is evil
